body: Thanks for the contribution!
我也遇到了这个问题

The demo works great, good job! Will review the code closely later.

About the configuration design, `padding` has already been used as a common property of label. https://www.echartsjs.com/zh/option.html#series-pie.label.padding I suggested use `distance`, or a more specific `distanceToLabelLine`.
Anybody know why

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵

You can get the global `echarts` variable. Here's an example: https://jsfiddle.net/ovilia/n6xc4df3/
Please check your HTML to make sure it is including the JavaScript correctly.

Use this demo:

Select a sector and then filter out that selected sector using the legend.

我这边是画K线图遇到同样的问题，需要删除一些已经存在的线，我的方法如下，希望帮到有同样问题的人
            var tmp = myChart.getOption();    //获取所有当前属性和数据
            myChart.clear();                  //清空所有属性和数据
            tmp.series.splice(1,4);           //删除数据中2~5的数据
            myChart.setOption(tmp);           //删除后的数据重新绘制

The `API` in `highcharts` used to set the `max` value of yAxis, echarts also has the same [API](https://www.echartsjs.com/zh/option.html#yAxis.max).
You can do this with three different series.
@Ovilia @pissang  help me！！！Thank you！！！

Sorry, but please ask *how-to* questions on [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/echarts) or [segmentfault（中文）](https://segmentfault.com/t/echarts). You may also send an email about your question to dev@echarts.apache.org if you like.

Here's why:

Maintaining open source projects, especially popular ones, is [hard work](https://nolanlawson.com/2017/03/05/what-it-feels-like-to-be-an-open-source-maintainer/). As ECharts's user base has grown, we are getting more and more usage questions, bug reports, feature requests and pull requests every single day.

As a free and open source project, ECharts also has limited maintainer bandwidth. That means the only way to ensure the project's sustainability is to:

1. Prioritize more concrete work (bug fixes and new features);
2. Improve issue triaging efficiency.

For (1), we have decided to use the GitHub issue lists exclusively for work that has well-defined, actionable goals. Questions and open ended discussions should be posted to mediums that are better suited for them.

For (2), we have found that issues that do not provide proper information upfront usually results in terribly inefficient back-and-forth communication just to extract the basic information needed for actual triaging. This is exactly why we have created this app: to ensure that every issue is created with the necessary information, and to save time on both sides.

o, I see.  You mean, after the previous selected item has been removed, the selected state would be applied to next slice.. It seems a bug ? @Ovilia . 
I guess the selected state is bind to index of item in data array, not item ID,  which cause this to happen.

Hi Olivia, 

I was not able to access the echarts variable because the echarts variable is not exported in the echarts.js file. I made the following highlighted change in the echarts.js file, after which I could access the echarts in my jsp page.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4497558/69122001-b0d6f780-0ac3-11ea-9380-0cdcae2e2af8.png)

I am closing the ticket now as I can create charts using echarts, but with a limitation that I have to change the echarts.js file to access echarts variable.

Thanks for the help.
Thanks for the contribution. It has been fixed in https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/pull/11648

I prever still using current `curveness` property. 

If we have multiple edges, we can do linear interpolation between [0, curveness] for each edge.
Does any administrator know about this problem?

> The demo works great, good job! Will review the code closely later.
> 
> About the configuration design, `padding` has already been used as a common property of label. https://www.echartsjs.com/zh/option.html#series-pie.label.padding I suggested use `distance`, or a more specific `distanceToLabelLine`.

Sure. I will update the name after your review.
I think this way maybe work, `step` can be implicitly derived by the range, but I prefer the range should be [-curveness, curveness] to keep symmetry.

I don't think saving to clipboard is a common need for chart viewers. But you can save the SVG file by setting [saveAsImage](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#toolbox.feature.saveAsImage) and `type` should be `'svg'`.
@Ovilia But I want to know this method
@Ovilia help me！
What do you want to know? How to make it possible to provide such a new toolbox feature?

![微信图片_20191119163817](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42328995/69130480-8f8a0180-0aeb-11ea-914f-f5015174a8aa.png)
@Ovilia @pissang  How can this function be implemented?

1. No. But you can change the code and use the build from it.
2. See the code [here](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/tree/master/src/component/toolbox/feature). As for clipboard, you probably need something like [clipboard.js](https://clipboardjs.com/).

@Ovilia 是这样的，我做的这个项目是用Qt嵌入Echarts显示图表，首先从本地文件中解析数据信息然后传给Echarts显示，然后领导需要用这个图写相关的文档，那么就需要提供一个按钮将图保存到剪贴板，然后Ctrl+V就拷贝到word中了，这样操作比较方便，你说的那种先保存到本地，然后再从word插入也可以实现这个功能，但是操作上就麻烦很多，所以我想实现这个功能，我觉得Echarts也应该提供一个这样的功能，毕竟剪贴板也是一个小平台，有的时候不是都要保存到本地的，再比如直接保存到剪贴板然后粘贴到qq发送等等，希望你们可以考虑下这个需求真的很实用，谢谢
@Ovilia 我搞定了用  document.querySelector('svg').outerHTML  获取svg的文本串，然后传给Qt，用Qt实现保存到剪贴板功能，但是我刚才提的那个需求真的很使用，希望你们考虑下，另外能否帮我看看#11675，谢谢
@deqingli You are right, it should be [-curveness, curveness]
Any updates on this?
@100pah Do you have any suggestions

> 意思就是可不可以给 graph 图设置边界 不要让节点超出画布。我现在也遇到这个问题。 @deqingli
我也遇到同样的问题，请问你找到解决方法了吗？谢谢~

@deqingli 
**Steps to reproduce:**
1. Open the link (https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xWNzZjbNt&v=1)
2. Click the '横向选择' button in the toolbox
3. Using the brush to select an area.
4. Observe that all the line charts are highlighting.

**Expected:**
Since I set the `outOfBrush` in the brush config(You can check the link config), the selected  area should be highlighted, and the unselected should have 0.5 transparency.

是的 看起来是柱子歪了

在实现子弹图的时候发现这个问题，现在通过创建两个y轴，并将柱子分别放在不同的y轴，避免使用barGap遇到不居中的问题，暂时绕过了这个问题，但还是希望官方能够处理下，谢谢。
https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xgxczLxKi

@whereiscode Hi, you can try using https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#visualMap-continuous.seriesIndex to specify the series to be visual encoded by visualMap.

About the `view` problem. There is an option `viewControl`. You can either tweak the https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option-gl.html#grid3D.viewControl.center or https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option-gl.html#grid3D.viewControl.alpha to get the view you want

> What's the rule for your x axis labels?

the distance between labels can be customized with call back function ranged from [0,1],
where 0 means very close. 1 means relative far.
So I can adjust the distance netween labels from callback funtion easily. Example are,

the above graphs the distance among '12h' '1h' '30mins' are, lets said 0.3
and distance between '12h' '1h' '30mins' and another '12h' '1h' '30mins' are, lets said 0.9

Initially I implemented with visualMap continuos, but it's not plotting the graph as expected. If required I can share the dataset which I'm using.

**With visual map:**
![visual-map](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20918310/69217417-9fa9eb80-0b94-11ea-8d60-5840b2804ad7.JPG)

**Expected Behaviour:**
![required](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20918310/69217456-b6504280-0b94-11ea-8451-d018305ac612.JPG)

Actually Color between two points are dependent on other parameter. Say there are three lists
1. [5,8,10,6,12]
2. ['2019-10-12T10:05:00.000Z','2019-10-12T10:10:00.000Z','2019-10-12T10:15:00.000Z','2019-10-12T10:20:00.000Z','2019-10-12T10:25:00.000Z']
3. [3,1,2,1,2]

Graph will be plotted between 1 and 2. The filling color of line between two data points is dependent on the values of third list.
